item.title: Deadpool Kills the Marvel Universe (2011 - 2012)
item.description: body { background-image: url('/img/fiction/deadpool-kills-marvel-universe.webp'); } Deadpool Kills the Marvel Universe. Cullen Bunn; Dalibor Talajic. www.marvel.com . www.hoopladigital.com . marvel.fandom.com . 2012. Accessed Mar 4, 2024. WATCHER. It is here that Dr. Benjamin Brighton has introduced radical new treatments designed to ease troubled minds… and turn malicious souls toward the pursuit of peace. DEADPOOL. This little gadget I stole from Mr.
